title: Resources
body:
Resources, resources, resources! It's always resources!
I'll have to 'request'	more from my test subjects.
Maybe I should make a better name for them....but first I'll need to figure out what I'll need before asking them for it.
And I should reward them for their efforts, like Fredrick did. I think a randomized bag would be good as well, that way the subjects will be excited before claiming the fruits of their labour. - Dr. Wynter, Log #6
